website_summaries.verdict: Though it still has a couple of faults, the new version of the Acer C7 Chromebook is faster, longer lasting, and better all around. All this and its very low price tag makes it the best inexpensive Chromebook on the market.
pros: More RAM for better, zippier performance
Swappable 6-cell battery lasts longer on the road
Big 320GB hard drive for a Chromebook
Full selection of ports, including Ethernet and VGA
Keyboard blends traditional and Chrome layouts

customer_reviews.title: A solid laptop with a very reliable Chrome Op system
customer_reviews.text: It is a small screen at 11 inches, but this is one excellent laptop that is absolutely rock solid with the Chrome operating system. No more anti-virus software, or all the nonsense of Windows. It only gives a browser but that's all that I need. Everything in the browser works great, video, displays, etc. Printing is an issue in that only a wireless printer can be accessed, and Java displays (which I find are few) are not supported. I rarely ever use my Windows machine but I did get a larger 14 inch Chrome laptop for my older eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sielicki

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this computer. I purchased this one year ago, and exactly a year later I find myself having to buy a new computer. The screen has given out and become all static-like. When the power chord is plugged in, the mouse lags. This is definitely not a computer you should use for travel purposes because the paint on the outside scratches off easily. Considering the amount of time this computer has lasted me, it was not worth the money spent. I will not be repurchasing a chromebook, and especially not from acer, because chromebooks lack many of the features which I find essential as a college student such as Microsoft office.
customer_reviews.author: sjdfsdjfdsf

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice computer! It powers up super fast. Only warning I would give to someone wanting to buy this is that it does not have windows, so you can't install office on it. However, there are apps you can download that are comparable to Microsoft Excel, word, etc. This is smaller than your average laptop so it can easily be carried in a backpack or bookbag. Very lightweight and the screen display is crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine R Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something small, lightweight with not a lot of cords. This is it. I use Google for pretty much everything at work, so this is perfect if I need to continue my work at home using Google drive. As a public school speech language pathologist, that happens A LOT more than I would like. It took me a minute to get used to not having Office, but I did and it's all good. Can't beat the price. I really love it. I'm very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: mcjones

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Purchased as my sons first laptop and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Purchased as my sons first laptop and it is amazing! I enjoy using this as well size is amazing quality perfect price.....even better!!!!! Does everything I need it to do and more plus looks great doing it! Can't go wrong! I did a ton of research before committing and 3 years later I'm writing this review!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chromebook for its Price
customer_reviews.text: The Acer C710-2856 (or any C710/720 model) is an amazing chrome book worth its money. If you are looking for an inexpensive and easily replaceable laptop this is the one. I own a MacBook Pro at home and was to afraid to actual travel with it and end up breaking it. This Chromebook makes up for that. Also I have found ChromeOS to be more useful than Windows for sure. If your considering this Chromebook I would purchase it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase of 2013!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little computer for my daughter for Christmas, 2013 because it was the laptop they use at her Junior High. It has turned out to be such a great purchase for us. It is a durable computer for a great price. Even some of my friends have now purchased it for their children. A few weeks ago, our dog chewed through the cord and I was able to get another cheap and quick from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Boricua Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's doing its job
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done! If you're on a budget and you have Wi-Fi at home or you have access to it. I'd say get it. The glossy glare on this one you'd have to adjust the screen for like watching movies or videos. I use this for the web and videos, movies, music. It's good. No complaints. Only fix the glossy glare and make video recording more easy. Still trying to figure that part out.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Acer laptop
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and I didnt have high hope for a second hand computer but the picture was misleading since it was not an actual pict of the product and the laptop has a bad battery that only charges to 1% and must stay plugged in to work. The outside was badly scratched which I could have dealt with but the internal parts and components should have been working for it to be resold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Chromebook! It is super light and it does pretty much everything! It also shipped way faster than I thought it would. I love online shopping, but I kinda get nervous right before I buy something just because you never know exactly what you are getting. However this product is fantastic and I have no complaints :) I highly recommend this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price I paid. Start up is quick, syncing feature with the rest of my Google products is handy, and provides a great picture. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the fact that the speakers are on the bottom of the unit, projecting downward, not out towards the listener.
customer_reviews.author: jrev0504

customer_reviews.title: Broken Charging Port :(
customer_reviews.text: After a month and a half my charging port started acting up. This is very upsetting because I love my chromebook....but if the thing can't even charge anymore, it's pointless.
customer_reviews.author: MissSwift

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for its price. I compare it to the Samsung Chromebook and like different things about the two products. Acer may be a tiny bit faster and functions better with several windows open while the Samsung is lighter weight and has a longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Does What It was Purchased to Do
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient device for Internet use.... It was not really meant for writing a novel or other hard letter formats. It is durable and I find it handy.
customer_reviews.author: SaltyDawg

customer_reviews.title: its nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little laptop got it to carry in my pocket book, since I cant do that with my 15 ̈. When you get it just make sure the OS is installed properly then you are on your way. Works nice.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not tech savvy at all and he simply wanted something to browse the internet with. This is very light so he can use it anywhere he is and very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gifts for graduate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the Chromebooks and gave them as gifts for our twin granddaughters graduation. Having asked them, they seemed to be very pleased with them. The portability will be perfect for those jaunts between college classes. It is just what they needed.
customer_reviews.author: jean m walsh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this chrombook. It is perfect for internet surfing, research, and having Google docs on here makes any word processing projects I have super easy. I couldn't be happier with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Kenz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Charge Port
customer_reviews.text: It was a great chromebook when plugged in, but had to return it due lack of charging the battery correctly even after two chargers being replaced and another battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Saragoza

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: It's a very handy device that runs very fast and is so quick to use...no long boot-up times of a traditional computer.
customer_reviews.author: dstenger

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good seems to work alright if it last's it will be a good deal you will need a hard case it scratches easily good
customer_reviews.author: truck300lb

customer_reviews.title: Love my chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: The price was ok. Very easy to use. The mouse pad surprisingly is very user friendly. Only drawback, it gets hot quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Helena JB

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it. The price was even better. This is a good investment at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronada

customer_reviews.title: chrome is all you need
customer_reviews.text: buy cheap. upgrade cheap. a steal. WHy overy pary for apple, windows, etc. when everything you do is browser based.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer_Sovereignty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The box looked like it was already opened and tampered with, I returned this bad boy instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. AN

customer_reviews.title: Great starter for the 10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Best Xmas present I could have ever purchased for my 10 yr old daughter . Easy interface and just what she needs to get started and I can pull her out of the house and get her outside
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was nice, but I wanted one that had DVD install capacity on it
customer_reviews.author: Irene Soderberg

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works good n left it in a safe place a great compact laptop.and it works just fine.perfect for that price
customer_reviews.author: Tejpaul S.

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: It was a great deal. Not to computer smart but am glad I got this 1 it is easy to work. Even my kids can figure everything out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Not a regular windows laptop
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this... Compact and easy to use. Had to buy a wireless printer thou.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a utility notebook to listen to Internet radio, watch you tubes, etc. its lightweight and compact and the chrome os is very quick and lightweight as well. But again I use it for very simple stuff. Still contemplating putting Ubuntu on it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I am so pleased with this purchase. It does everything I need to do on a home computer in a lot less time. Granted, I don't ask a lot. It was well worth it's price.
customer_reviews.author: theresa cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually posting this review from this very laptop after receiving it. I've had it for seven months and it has yet to give me problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Acer 11.6" Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Mother-in-law and Father-in-law loves it works good for what they needed. easy to operate. Small enough for them to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Kern

customer_reviews.title: good for me and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Does everthing i want. I cant keep it out my ol lady hands. It is my first lap top. My daughters is an exspensive hp and she likes the acer
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop works well, but arrived with lots of scratches on the case and actual food particles between some of the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy my chromebook! Easy to carry and does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Georganna P. Sherbert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the plug in when it comes to charging now it won't charge
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I didn't even get a chromebook, I got a acer laptop
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rehfuss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my daughter. She enjoys it and has had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: SA Bryan

customer_reviews.title: HOW DO t GET THIS THING TO MAKE COFFEE???
customer_reviews.text: GREAT MACHINE,fits my needs,and good for most people (I was in the buz years ago) Only downside...got no paperwork- but found no instructions needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Vavzycki

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded expectations. It does more that I thought it could. Speed with WIFI is super. I am learning more all the time. It is so nice to be freed from my PC!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Kost

customer_reviews.title: Acer C710 Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This computer is all I thought it would be. I would have appreciated a better explanation of how to connect to the Internet by Wi-Fi than the included instructions.
customer_reviews.author: vanhorn1050

customer_reviews.title: my laptop is very good
customer_reviews.text: I really like my laptop I have no problems with it. Its easy to work with.. I give amazon a very big five on it.
customer_reviews.author: jack g.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device for the money. If you know what it's capable of and what you're looking for you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Greg Watson

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with the chromebook. my husband is able to access al his school accounts on it and that was why I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! its in great condition and its very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! its in great condition and its very fast. I only use it for research and documenting so its all good.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great. Does everything I want out of a Chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: clay simpkins

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to go along with my phone for travel its small but gets the job done, i like it better than a tablet and the battery is replaceable i get 6hrs now , and i have 8gb of ram
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Notebook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook as a gift for my brother and he absolutely loves it. It is just what he wanted to pay bills, order off the internet and check mail. Great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Horn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Small, compact, has all the apps I require, boots up quick. I got one for my wife also.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Mason

customer_reviews.title: It runs on Google Chrome and almost no applications run ...
customer_reviews.text: It runs on Google Chrome and almost no applications run on it without expensive downloads at the app store.
customer_reviews.author: Lola C. Gitschier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute... and it works perfectly. I cant believe it's that cheap
customer_reviews.author: jeanna

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! Lowest price in store $199 plus 9.25% tax. It is great for reading and travel. Works great w/ mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie Sue Martin

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews before purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Can not use skype or download photos from my IPhone . Chrome store too limited! Can't get help with tech questions. Have to put in email and password with every use. Speakers are too weak and distorted. Very disappointed . C J
customer_reviews.author: c j rock

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have been a little bit more detailed about the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG MISTAKE!
customer_reviews.text: IT STARTED ACTING STRANGE AFTER WEEK 1, THEN BY WEEK 3 IT COMPLETELY IMPLODED - THE ONLY THING LEFT WAS A GIANT ERROR MESG THAT SAID THE ENTIRE CHROME OS NEEDED TO BE RE-INSTALLED (which obviously only the Seller would be able to do) and I've not rec'd a single email response from seller regarding returning for refund! I still have it sitting in original box with no use for it at all :(
customer_reviews.author: Sharon39

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a computer person. I thought it would do what I wanted to do. Basic stuff. I can't even print pictures with my printer unless I pay for the Cloud. So if that info isn't given before you buy it you're screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Heil

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Bib mistake on my part. I wanted to use this in my garage and outside under my carport. Wifi works fine either place. It is really fast and convenient to use but not suitable to use out doors. Unlike my Kindle you cannot see this screen and not much use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie McCurry

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea what happened.
customer_reviews.text: Rewriting this review but I'm gonna keep the rating the same. Somehow after I wrote this review, this laptop completely changed. I've barely ever had any freezes, the videos I want to watch always loads, and I can have many different tabs open at a time with it not slowing down at all. When i first had this I would have to restart it again and again just because the whole thing would freeze. I really don't know what happened but it's a lot better now. Although I still wish it could read files and it had a DVD drive, thinking about it, the price I got it for was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a laptop that can do more than web searches look elsewhere. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Scovel

product_meta.title: Acer C710 Chromebook (11.6" 2GB) C710-2856
product_meta.description: Continually updated, always new, the Acer Iron Gray 11.6" Chromebook, C710-2856 keeps getting better and better. It starts in seconds, has virus protection built in and runs your favorite Google apps plus thousands more. At about an inch thin and 3 lbs light, this Acer Iron Gray 11.6" Chromebook, C710-2856 goes wherever you go and keeps your files safe and secure in the cloud.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars104 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
